name: WineHelper
0:
”Alexa, open wine helper”
”Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me some red wine made from blueberry”
”Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me some red wine which has long lasting taste”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wine helper
des:
The purpose of "Wine Helper" Alexa Skill is to help the user choose wine based on their requirement. If you are not sure which wine to choose, you can just ask wine helper to suggest some wine names that fit your needs. 

How does it work?
For example, when the user says: Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me some red wine made from blueberry. Machine Learning model sitting behind the scenes takes the input, does all the hard work for you and predict the most suitable top 3 wines based on the users choice.

The following are the list of helpful utterances that user can choose from but not limited to:

Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me some red wine
Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me some red wine which has the long lasting taste
Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me some red wine which has a smoky aroma
Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me some red wine which is mild
Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me some red wine made from blueberry
Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me all wines that have a dry taste
Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me some raspberry flavored wine
Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me some high alcohol wine
Alexa, ask wine helper to suggest me a red wine which has the bitter taste
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
